SKT_FIRST.name: Shooting Crystal
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy.\nDeals damage proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Speed</color>.
description: Attacks an enemy.\nDeals damage proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Speed</color>.
SKT_FIRST.name_jp: シューティングクリスタル
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격합니다.\n이 스킬은 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>속도</color>가 높을수록 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与える。\nこのスキルは、自分の<color=#28d9ed>スピード</color>が高いほどダメージがUPする。

SKT_SECOND.name: Shine Crystal
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Increases all allies' <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> and <color=#28d9ed>Accuracy</color> for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
description: Increases all allies' <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> and <color=#28d9ed>Accuracy</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000031_2_1] turn(s)</color>.
SKT_SECOND.name_jp: シャイニークリスタル
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: 味方全体の<color=#28d9ed>攻撃力</color>と<color=#28d9ed>命中</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間UPさせる。

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Storm Crystal
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks all enemies and has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to increase the duration of <color=#28d9ed>buffs</color> for all allies for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Increases Speed Increase duration by 1 turn

description: Attacks all enemies and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000031_3_1]</color> chance to increase the duration of <color=#28d9ed>buffs</color> for all allies for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000031_3_1] turn(s)</color>.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 적 전체를 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> 확률로 아군 전체의 <color=#28d9ed>강화 효과</color> 지속 턴을 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 증가시킵니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 敵全体にダメージを与え、<color=#28d9ed>70%</color>の確率で味方全体の<color=#28d9ed>強化効果</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>増加させる。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, recovers <color=#28d9ed>2.5%</color> Action Points.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Damage increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Speed</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, recovers <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000031_chain_1_1]</color> Action Points.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Damage increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Speed</color>.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
4_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
5_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 컴패니언 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>2.5%</color>의 AP를 회복합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 이 공격은 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>속도</color>가 높을수록 피해량이 증가합니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(汎用)</color>:攻撃後、APを<color=#28d9ed>2.5%</color>獲得する。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:この攻撃は、自分の<color=#28d9ed>スピード</color>が高いほどダメージがUPする。
